title: A Powerful Weapon
text: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
author: Nelson Mandela

title: Learning Is Permanent
text: The beautiful thing about learning is that no one can take it away from you.
author: B.B. King

title: Lighting the Fire
text: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
author: William Butler Yeats

title: Lifelong Learning
text: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

title: Read to Grow
text: The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go.
author: Dr. Seuss

title: Freedom Through Education
text: Education is the key to unlock the golden door of freedom.
author: George Washington Carver

title: Fire of the Mind
text: The mind is not a vessel to be filled, but a fire to be kindled.
author: Plutarch

title: Best Investment
text: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

title: Future Passport
text: Education is the passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.
author: Malcolm X

title: Treasure of Learning
text: Learning is a treasure that will follow its owner everywhere.
author: Chinese Proverb

title: Critical Thinking
text: The purpose of education is to replace an empty mind with an open one.
author: Malcolm S. Forbes

title: Education Is Life
text: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.
author: John Dewey

title: Strong Foundation
text: Education is the foundation upon which we build our future.
author: Christine Gregoire

title: Open Mind
text: The only thing that interferes with my learning is my education.
author: Albert Einstein

title: From Darkness to Light
text: Education is the movement from darkness to light.
author: Allan Bloom

title: Premise of Progress
text: Knowledge is power. Information is liberating. Education is the premise of progress.
author: Kofi Annan

title: Beyond School
text: Education is not just about going to school and getting a degree. It's about widening your knowledge and absorbing the truth about life.
author: Shakuntala Devi

title: Learning Pays
text: The more you learn, the more you earn.
author: Warren Buffett

title: Confidence Builder
text: Education breeds confidence. Confidence breeds hope. Hope breeds peace.
author: Confucius

title: Sweet Reward
text: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
author: Aristotle

title: Mind and Morals
text: To educate a person in the mind but not in morals is to educate a menace to society.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

title: True Education
text: Intelligence plus character â€” that is the goal of true education.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.
